rules.name: Act of terror/Terroranschlag - 20000053 - Final
rules.query: (or (title any/stemming "Attentat AttentΓ€ter Anschlag Anschlagversuch Doppelanschlag SprengstoffgΓΌrtel Terroranschlag") (and ("Anschlag") (or (text_content adj "Charlie Hebdo") ("Hurghada") ) ) )

rules.name: Military equipment/Militaerische Ausruestung - 20000601 - Final
rules.query: (or // quite specific types military equipment, here mostly related to grenades // (body adj "Flak-Granate") (body adj "Steyr-AUG-Sturmgewehren") (text_content any/stemming "Eihandgranate Fliegerbombe Gewehrgranate Granatenexport Luftabwehrsystem Splittergranate") // tests of nuclear or h bombs // ("Atombombentest") (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("Wasserstoffbombe") ("Test") ) (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("Wasserstoffbombe") ("getestet") ) // specific treaties / laws related to military equipment // (body adj "Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty") ("Kriegsmaterialiengesetz") // export of miliary equipment // ("Waffenexporte") )
(or (title any/stemming "Attentat AttentΓ€ter Anschlag Anschlagversuch Doppelanschlag SprengstoffgΓΌrtel Terroranschlag") (and ("Anschlag") (or (text_content adj "Charlie Hebdo") ("Hurghada") ) ) )

rules.name: Pension/Rente - 20000532 - Final
rules.query: (and (or // terms specifically related to pension // (title any/stemming "Beamtenpension Frauenpension InvaliditΓ€tspension Pension Pensionsdebatte Pensionistenpreisindex Pensionsdeal Pensionsantrittsalter Pensionskassen Pensionsreform Pensionsreserve Pensionssystem Pensionstransfer Vorsorgekasse") (subtitle any/stemming "Beamtenpension Frauenpension InvaliditΓ€tspension Pension Pensionsdebatte Pensionistenpreisindex Pensionsdeal Pensionsantrittsalter Pensionskassen Pensionsreform Pensionsreserve Pensionssystem Pensionstransfer Vorsorgekasse") ) (not (text_content any/stemming "Hotel Tourismus") ) )

rules.name: University/UniversitΓ€t - 20000407 - Final
rules.query: (or // words related to university in title and subtitle // (title any "ArchitekturfakultΓ€t Doktorat Ehrendoktorat Ehrendoktorrat Erasmus Privatuni Professur Uni Unis") (title any/stemming "Hochschulstudien UniversitΓ€t UniversitΓ€tsbibliothek Uniklinikum UniversitΓ€tsstudium Wissenschaftsrat") (title adj/stemming "universitΓ€r") (subtitle adj/stemming "universitΓ€r") (subtitle any/stemming "UniversitΓ€t UniversitΓ€tsstudium") (title adj "Uni-Zugang") (title adj "Uni-Budget") // types of universities and research institutes // (title adj/stemming "Technischen Unis") (subtitle adj/stemming "Technischen Unis") (title adj "Uni-Kliniken") (subtitle adj "Uni-Kliniken") // specific universities and institutes // (text_content adj/stemming "Internationalen Bodenseehochschule") (text_content adj "Johannes Kepler UniversitΓ€t") (title adj "Kunstuni Graz") (subtitle adj "Kunstuni Graz") (text_content adj "KunstuniversitΓ€t Graz") (title adj/stemming "Max Planck-Institut") (subtitle adj/stemming "Max Planck-Institut") (title adj "Med-Uni Graz") (subtitle adj "Med-Uni Graz") (title adj "TU Graz") (subtitle adj "TU Graz") (title adj "UniversitΓ€t Graz") (subtitle adj "UniversitΓ€t Graz") // university grant fund // (text_content adj "Wiener Wissenschafts-, Forschungs- und Technologiefonds") )

rules.name: Unions/Gewerkschaft - 20000536 - Final
rules.query: (and (or // German word for union in title or subtitle // (title any/stemming "Gewerkschaft") (subtitle any/stemming "Gewerkschaft") // specific unions // (title any "ΓGB") (subtitle any "ΓGB") (title adj "Spielergewerkschaft VdF") (text_content adj "Gewerkschaft Bau-Holz") (text_content adj "Gewerkschaft der Privatangestellten") (text_content adj "GPA-djp") (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("Γrztegewerkschaft") ("Asklepios") ) ) // exclusion terms, mainly related to general news // (not (title adj "APA Medien News") (title adj "Sieben Tage Wirtschaft") ) )

rules.name: Employment statistics/Arbeitsmarktdaten - 20000365 - Final
rules.query: (and (or/countunique>3 (title any/stemming "Arbeitslose") (title = "Arbeitslosigkeit") (title any "Arbeitsmarkt") (text_content any/stemming "Arbeitslosenzahl") (text_content any/stemming "Ausbildungserhebung") (text_content any/stemming "Jobchancen") (text_content any/stemming "Wachstumsperspektiven") (text_content any/stemming "Wirtschaftsforschungsinstitut") ("AMS") ("ArbeitskrΓ€fteerhebung") ("Arbeitslosenquote") ("Arbeitslosenrate") ("Arbeitslosigkeit") ("Arbeitsmarktdaten") ("Arbeitsmarktintegration") ("Arbeitsmarktintegration") ("Arbeitsmarktservice") (or ("Statistik") ("Prozent") ) (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("steigt") ("Arbeitslosigkeit") ) ) )

rules.name: Bankruptcy/Insolvenz - 20000174 - Final
rules.query: (or (and // entities that can go bankrupt // (or (text_content adj "FuΓball-Zweitligist") (text_content any/stemming "Academy Akadmie Baufirma Baufirmen Handelskette Handelsunternehmen Lebensmittelhandelskette ModehΓ€ndler Supermarktkette Tochterunternehmen Unternehmen") ) // general terms related to bankruptcy // (or (text_content any/stemming "Ausfallwahrscheinlichkeit Firmenpleite insolvent Insolvenz Konkurs pleite pleitegegangen Sanierungsplan") ) ) // specific terms related to bankruptcy // (or (text_content any "Insolvenzrahmen Konkursverfahren") (text_content any/stemming "Insolvenzantrag Insolvenzursache Insolvenzverwalter Insolvenzverwalterin Masseverwalter Privatinsolvenz Privatkonkurs") ) )

rules.name: Health insurance/Zusatzversicherung - 20000483 - Final

rules.name: Film/Cinema - 20000005 - Final

rules.name: Medical research/Medizinische Forschung - 20000737 - Final

"Austrian Stroke Prevention Study") (text_content adj "Biotech-Medikament") (text_content adj "Deutschen Krebspreis") (text_content adj "Medizinische Wissenschaft") (text_content adj "Monoglyzerid-Lipase") (text_content adj "Phase-I-Untersuchungen") (text_content adj "Smart Drugs") (text_content adj "Symposiums zur Suchterkrankung") (text_content all/stemming "Erforschung rules.name: Government budget/Staatshaushalt - 20000607 - Final
rules.query: (or (or (text_content adj "Bund der Steuerzahler") (title all "Bundesheer Budget") (title = "Budgetdisziplin") ) (or/countunique>1 (title = "Steuerreform") (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("Einnahmen") ("Staates") ) (title any "Budget") (text_content adj "Einkommenssteuer-System") (text_content adj "Kalte Progression") ("Budgetsprecher") ("Budgetziele") ("Bundesbudget") ("Bundeshaushalt") ("Staatsbudget") ("Steuergerechtigkeit") ("Steuerzahler") ) )

rules.name: National elections/Parlamentswahlen - 20000579 - Final
rules.query: (or (title adj "Irland-Wahl") (title adj "Slowakei-Wahl") (title adj "US-Wahlen") (and (or (title any/stemming "kroatisch mazedonisch") (title any/stemming "Afghanistan Iran Kroatien Mazedonien Montenegro Serbien Slowakei Uganda Vanuatu") ) (or (title any/stemming "Neuwahl Parlamentswahl Regierungsbildung Regierungsteilnahme Γbergangsregierung Wahl Wahldatum Wahlergebnis Wahlkommission Wahltermin Wahlvoraussetzung") (subtitle any/stemming "Neuwahl Parlamentswahl Regierungsbildung Regierungsteilnahme Γbergangsregierung Wahl Wahldatum Wahlergebnis Wahlkommission Wahltermin Wahlvoraussetzung") ) ) )

rules.name: Fire/Feuer - 20000150 - Final
rules.query: (or // non-specific terms // (or/countunique>1 // individual any-stemming statements to be able to trigger countunique more than once // ("Berufsfeuerwehr") ("Brand") ("Brandstiftung") ("Brandursache") ("Einsatzfahrzeug") ("Feuer") ("Feuerwehr") ("Verbrennungen") ) (or // fire in title // (title = "Brand") (title = "Feuerwehr") // specific types of fire // (text_content any "Kleinbrand Wohnhausbrand Wohnungsbrand") // other specific terms // (text_content adj "Waldbrand-Alarm") (text_content any "Brandstifter Einsatzjacke Rauchgas Rauchgasvergiftung Serienbrandstifter Zigarettenglut") ) )

rules.name: Sexual assault/Sexuelle Gewalt - 20000085 - Final
rules.query: (or (or/countunique>3 (text_content adj/stemming "geschlechtlicher NΓΆtigung") ("Anklage") ("Anzeige") ("Attacke") ("attackiert") ("bedrΓ€ngt") ("erpresst") ("Kinderporno") ("minderjΓ€hrig") ("Missbrauch") ("missbraucht") ("ObszΓΆnitΓ€t") ("Opferschutz") ("Opferschutz") ("Pornofilme") ("Sex") ("Strafverfahren") ("VerdΓ€chtiger") ("Vergewaltiger") ("Vergewaltigung") (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("sexueller") ("BelΓ€stigung") ) (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("sexuelle") ("BelΓ€stigung") ) (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("sexuell") ("belΓ€stigt") ) (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("Frau") ("bedrΓ€ngt") ) (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("unsittlichen") ("BerΓΌhrungen") ) (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("GesΓ€Γ") ("betastet") ) ) (or (text_content adj "unsittlich berΓΌhrt") ("PΓ€dophilie") ("Silvesterattacken") ("vergewaltigt") ("vergewaltigen") (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("Γbergriffe") ("Frauen") ) (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("belΓ€stigt") ("Frauen") ) (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("sexuellen") ("Missbrauchs") ) (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("sexuellen") ("Γbergriff") ) (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("sexueller") ("Γbergriffe") ) (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("sexueller") ("Γbergriff") ) (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("Rock") ("fassen") ) ) )

rules.name: Data protection/datenschutz - 20000627 - Final
rules.query: (or // all quite specific terms that are quite likely only to appear in the context of data protection // (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 (body = "Abkommen") (or (body adj "Privacy Shield") (body adj "Safe Harbor") ) ) (text_content adj "Datenschutz-Reform") (text_content adj "datenschutzrechtliche Grundlage") (text_content adj "personenbezogene Daten") (text_content adj "Handy-Standortdaten") (text_content adj "Recht auf PrivatsphΓ€re") (text_content adj "zentrales Kontenregister") (text_content any "Informationsfreiheitsgesetz Verkehrsdatenauskunft Vorratsdatenspeicherung") (text_content any/stemming "Datenschutzanliegen Datenschutzbeauftragte DatenschutzbehΓΆrde Datenschutzgedanke Datenschutzgruppe Datenschutzpaket Datenschutzrecht Datenschutzregelung") // also interesting terms, in APA test corpera they had a negative impact on precision though // // ( " Datenschutzgesetz " ) // // ( body adj " persΓΆnlichen Daten " ) // // ( " Datenschutz " ) // )

rules.name: Immigration/Einwanderung - 20000771 - Final

rules.name: Computer crime/Computerkriminalitaet - 20000086 - Final
rules.query: (or (and // specific forms of attacks // (or (text_content adj/stemming "Cyber-Attacke") (text_content adj/stemming "Cyber-BetrΓΌger") (text_content adj/stemming "DDOS-Attacke") (text_content any "Cyberangriff Cyberattacke Cybermobbing Datendiebstahl") ) // exclusion terms // (not (text_content = "BΓΆrse") (title adj "W I S S E N S C H A F T - B I L D U N G - TAGESPROGRAMM") ) ) // terms related to a specific attack on an organization which need to appear in the same sentence // (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("FACC") ("Cyberangriff") ) // terms related to a form of attack that appear in close proximity within the same sentence // (prox/unit=sentence/distance=1 ("Missbrauch") ("Daten") ) )

rules.name: Athletics/Leichtathletik - 20000827 - Final

rules.name: Cycling/Radsport - 20000892 - Final

rules.name: Fashion/Mode - 20000011 - Final
